subject: Re: desktop-base and KDE
body:
Joey Hess wrote:

Daniel Baumann wrote:
  

Daniel Baumann wrote:
    

to me, it looks like kde ignores these alternatives completely.
      

ok, verified this with an install of etch (kde iso), i just hit a few
times enter in non-export mode.. the result is the same: kde does *not*
care about the wallpaper or the splash screen.

the alternatives are the same as in the live cds. i think there is
something broken. did someone test this prior etch release?
    


Yes, and I asked about it on #debian-desktop with no response from
anyone, about 2 days before the release.

  


that's  strange.

Kde had some issues right before the release but they were solved ...
well ... i thought so.





--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
